lore: Whether helmets should break passively when worn (happens quickly).
Whether the potion blacklist is enabled
The blacklist itself can't be edited from in-game

prompt: BOLD+GREEN+Please send a list of names to add to the potion blacklist. If a sent potion is already on the list, it will be removed.
GREEN+A list of valid names may be found here: https://hub.spigotmc.org/javadocs/spigot/org/bukkit/potion/PotionType.html#enum-constant-summary
GREEN+The list must be formatted exactly like this:

lore: What types of golden apple should be cleared

valueMapTo.0: Don't clear any type of golden apple
valueMapTo.2: Clear both types of golden apple

prompt: BOLD+GREEN+Please select an option by sending a number between 0 and 2.
GREEN+0 - Don't clear any type of golden apple
RED+2 - Clear both types of golden apple
